topic: How to combine tabnanny with typing for production code (Python 3.12+)
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to combine tabnanny with typing for production code (Python 3.12+)

response_parsed.title: Combining Tabnanny and Typing for Production Code in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This explainer demonstrates how to use the latest features of Python 3.12, including Type Hints (typing module) and Tidy Imports (tabnanny), to improve the maintainability and readability of production code.
key_points: Understand the benefits of type hinting and tidy imports in Python 3.12
Learn how to use the typing module for explicit type annotations
Implement tabnanny to enforce consistent import styles in your codebase
Combine both features to improve code quality and maintainability
version_notes: This guide is specific to Python 3.12 and above
To use tabnanny, ensure you have it installed via pip
caveats: Type hints are not enforced at runtime but can improve IDE autocompletion
Tabnanny only enforces import style conventions and does not analyze the correctness of the imports
